tool_description: Very easy and fast Temporary Disposable E-mail API .. also on your own domain!
name: Easy Fast Temp Mail
title: Easy Fast Temp Mail

api_list.name: Create Mailbox
api_list.description: Create a new mailbox using specified email address

optional_parameters.name: public
optional_parameters.description:
This parameter is processed in PRO, ULTRA and MEGA plans only. 
By default, it is set to false and a private mailbox is created. To create a public mailbox, set it to true.
All created mailboxes in FREE plan are public.

api_list.name: Get email content
Get emails list
api_list.description: Get list of received email in mailbox
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com/myaddress@my24h.email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com/{address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Screenshot
api_list.description: Render email contents and return a PNG image

api_list.name: Attachments
api_list.description:
Retrieve email attachment list or a single attachment file.
If query parameter **idx** is missing, a JSON payload with email attachments details is returned.
If query parameter **idx**  is present, content of attachment  file is returned.

optional_parameters.name: idx
optional_parameters.description: Use this parameter to retrieve attachment contents. IDX = 0 is the first attachment file.

api_list.name: Domain - List
api_list.description: This endpoint return a list of your custom domains. For each domain, verification status and token is reported.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com/domains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Click on links
api_list.description: Click on email html body links  and return results.
